response:
Here are 50 short story prompts in a Python list:

```python
short_story_prompts = [
    "A mysterious box arrives at your doorstep with no return address.",
    "You wake up with the ability to fly, but only for one day.",
    "A person from your past comes back to haunt you, literally.",
    "You stumble upon a hidden world within your reflection.",
    "A magical pencil brings your drawings to life.",
    "You are given the chance to relive any day from your past.",
    "A strange creature is living in your attic, and it's not what you expect.",
    "You discover a portal to a parallel universe in your backyard.",
    "A memory from your childhood is false, and you must uncover the truth.",
    "You are the last person on earth, and you must find a way to survive.",
    "A time traveler from the future comes to warn you of an impending disaster.",
    "You are shrunk down to the size of a mouse and must navigate your own home.",
    "A ghost from a historical event is trapped in your house, and you must help it move on.",
    "You are given the power to shape-shift into any animal, but with a catch.",
    "A mysterious illness is spreading, and you are the only one immune.",
    "You are trapped in a never-ending loop of the same day, and you must find a way to escape.",
    "A magical book transports you into its world, and you must find a way back home.",
    "You are the chosen one, destined to save the world from an ancient evil.",
    "A device that can record and play back your dreams is invented, but it comes with a dark side.",
    "You are stuck in a virtual reality world, and you must find a way to escape.",
    "A group of strangers are brought together to solve a mysterious puzzle, and you are one of them.",
    "You are sent back in time to the Wild West, and you must navigate the lawless frontier.",
    "A strange, glowing artifact is discovered, and you are the only one who can unlock its secrets.",
    "You are the captain of a spaceship, and you must navigate through a treacherous asteroid field.",
    "A mysterious figure is following you, and you must uncover their true intentions.",
    "You are given the chance to switch lives with someone else for a day, but it comes with unexpected consequences.",
    "A hidden society of superheroes is revealed, and you are recruited to join their ranks.",
    "You are trapped in a haunted mansion, and you must find a way to escape before it's too late.",
    "A mysterious illness is turning people into zombies, and you are the only one who can find a cure.",
    "You are the last hope for humanity, and you must find a way to restore the planet to its former glory.",
    "A group of friends discover a way to communicate with the dead, but it comes with a terrible cost.",
    "You are a detective trying to solve a murder mystery, but the victim is not what they seem.",
    "A magical amulet gives you incredible powers, but it comes with a curse.",
    "You are sent to a mysterious island to uncover the secrets of a lost civilization.",
    "A person from your dreams becomes real, and you must navigate the blurred lines between reality and fantasy.",
    "You are given the chance to go back in time and change a historical event, but it comes with unforeseen consequences.",
    "A group of strangers are trapped in a room, and you must work together to escape before time runs out.",
    "You are the chosen one, destined to save the world from an ancient prophecy.",
    "A mysterious device can manipulate time, but it comes with a terrible cost.",
    "You are a spy trying to infiltrate a secret organization, but you are not what you seem.",
    "A group of friends discover a way to travel to alternate dimensions, but it comes with unexpected consequences.",
    "You are a scientist trying to uncover the secrets of a mysterious phenomenon, but it comes with a terrible cost.",
    "A magical portal leads to a world of eternal darkness, and you must find a way to survive.",
    "You are the last person on earth, and you must find a way to restore the planet to its former glory.",
    "A group of strangers are brought together to solve a mysterious puzzle, and you are one of them.",
    "You are given the chance to switch lives with someone else for a day, but it comes with unexpected consequences.",
    "A mysterious figure is following you, and you must uncover their true intentions.",
    "You are trapped in a virtual reality world, and you must find a way to escape.",
    "A group of friends discover a way to communicate with the dead, but it comes with a terrible cost."
]
```

You can use these prompts to generate short stories by selecting one at random or using a specific prompt as inspiration. You can also modify the prompts to fit your own writing style and interests.
